column5: Large private room with sitting area and spacious closet. Located in a quiet neighborhood. My zip code was recently rated Top 5 in the US! Conveniently located close to airport and easy access to all major highways. This is a great place for business trips. Large cozy bdrm & bath with safe driveway parking. Beautiful garden patio for enjoying morning coffee  *Note: This is 1 or 2 listing I have on this property Private Room | Quiet Space | Convenient Airport https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/19038050
column8: Large Quiet Private Room | Close to Airport
